meanings.definition: A small hole in a door or wall through which one can look
meanings.sent1: Through the stanhopes, I could see who was knocking on the door.
meanings.sent2: He peeked through the stanhopes to see if the coast was clear.
meanings.sent3: The detective solved the case by spying through the stanhopes in the wall.
meanings.sent4: Her eyes were like stanhopes, always observing everything around her.
meanings.sent5: The stanhopes in the fence allowed the curious cat to watch the birds outside.

meanings.definition: A type of optical device used to view photographs or pictures
meanings.sent1: She used the stanhopes to magnify the tiny details in the photograph.
meanings.sent2: The antique stanhopes displayed beautiful landscapes when looked through.
meanings.sent3: The children were amazed by the stanhopes that made the pictures appear closer.
meanings.sent4: His eyesight was so poor that he needed stanhopes to see the images clearly.
meanings.sent5: The stanhopes revealed hidden messages in the old family photos.
